#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define s(a) scanf("%lld",&a)
#define ll long long int
using namespace std;

int main()
{
   ll t;
   s(t);
   while(t--)
   {
      ll f1,f2,weight,n,i;
      s(f1); s(f2);
      
      weight = f2-f1;
      
      s(n);
      
      ll v[n+2],w[n+2];
      
      for(i=0;i<n;i++)
      {
         s(v[i]); s(w[i]);
      }
      
         ll value[weight+2],j;      
         value[0]=0;
              for(i=1;i<=weight;i++)
              {
                 value[i] = LLONG_MAX;
                 
                 for(j=0;j<n;j++)
                 {
                                 
                     if(w[j]<=i)
                     {
                         if(value[i-w[j]]!=LLONG_MAX)
                         {
                            value[i] = min(value[i] , v[j] + value[ i-w[j] ] );
                         }      
                     }
                 
                 }
              }
           /*
          for(i=1;i<=weight;i++)
           {
              cout<<value[i]<<" ";
           }
            */  
         if(value[weight]!=LLONG_MAX)
         {
            printf("The minimum amount of money in the piggy-bank is %lld.\n",value[weight]);
         }
         else
         {
             printf("This is impossible.\n");
         }     
   }
   
  return 0;
}
